mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_product (name, name_eng, type, price, img) VALUES (#{name}, #{name_eng}, #{type}, #{price}, #{img})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_product SET name = #{name}, name_eng = #{name_eng}, type = #{type}, price = #{price}, img = #{img} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id,name, name_eng, type, price, img FROM t_product order by id asc

select product_id as id, `name`, name_eng, `type`, price, img from t_order join t_order_detail on t_order.o_id = t_order_detail.order_id join t_product on product_id = t_product.id where user_id = #{userId} group by product_id order by sum(quantity) DESC limit 5

select p.name, p.price, p.img, p.type, c.id as commentId, c.user_id, c.rating, c.comment, (select name from t_user where id=c.user_Id ) userName, (select count(rating) from t_comment where product_id=p.id) as commentCnt, (select avg(rating) from t_comment where product_id=p.id) as avg, (select sum(quantity) from t_order_detail where product_id=p.id) as sells from t_product p left join t_comment c on p.id=c.product_id where p.id=#{productId} order by c.id desc;
